preference.name: AWC_HARD_LOAD_COUNT
preference.preference_description: Frees up the memory to the OS by forcing a hard full reload of Active Workspace client. Based on a number of user operations such as navigating to a new location or selecting a new tab in the work area will increment an internally managed counter. When the counter reaches the value supplied by this preference then a hard full reload of AW is performed. The internal count will be reset to 0 and the whole process will be repeated. Note: This preference only applies to the MS Internet Explorer (IE) Browser. Valid values are: * Less than or equal to 0 : Results in no Hard Reloads. -1 is the default value. * Greater than 0 : Results in Hard Reloads. A value of 20 is recommended initially, and increased or decreased based on browser memory consumption for common use cases.
